text: Università degli Studi Niccolò Cusano () is a private university in Rome, Italy. It was started on May 10, 2006, founded by Stefano Bandecchi. ==Organization== The university has 6 specialized schools. ===Courses in English=== The degree courses are delivered in English also. ==Rector== *Sebastiano Scarcella (2006 - 2010) *Giovanni Puoti (2010 - 2013) *Fabio Fortuna (2013 - ) ==President== *Giovanni Iacono (2006-2012) *Stefano Ranucci (2012 - ) ==Notes== ==Other websites== Niccolò Cusano Category:Organizations based in Rome Category:2006 establishments in Europe Category:2000s establishments in Italy
title: Università degli Studi Niccolò Cusano
